column4: is it possible to install Windows XP Pro as a dual boot alongside Ubuntu after I have already installed Ubuntu ?
It's possible but I think XP removes Grub so you should find some guide that tells you how to do it right
so I have to edit the grub booter?
I think you might have to install grub again afterwards but don't take my word for it. I always made sure to install XP first when I still used it.
